channel.title: Friend list
channel.description: I need a fix for p16 CWWorld's pm system. Whenever i try to send a pm, both people are disconnected and the server shows this [code]java.lang.NullPointerException at client.sendpm(client.java:26267) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19023) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14466) at client.process(client.java:14435) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:52) Project16 [fatal] - exception Could not save for blazefire[/code]. Any suggestions?

item.title: Friend list
